Helen Walker

WotD 56 - Geek

Sep 20, 2015

I do enjoy geekery; mine and other people's. It really doesn't matter whether their fascination is for food, art, wine, Shakespeare, or Doctor Who.

The way they explain things? The way their eyes light up? Their fondness for the detail of their particular obsession? Joyful.
